refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the current value (0-127) of a specified MIDI controller.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the current value (0-127) of a specified MIDI controller.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imin, imax -- set minimum and maximum limits on values obtained.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Get the current value (0-127) of a specified MIDI controller.

refsect1.title: Warning
refsect1.para: midictrl should only be used in notes that were triggered from MIDI, so that an associated channel number is available. For notes activated from the score, line events, or orchestra, the ctrl7 opcode that takes an explicit channel number should be used instead.
